info.name: Facebook Sans
info.description: Overrides Facebook's new (March 2014) Helvetica font with a sans-serif declaration, allowing a user's own browser settings to display the desired font. Think Facebook in Tahoma, Droid Sans or... (Heaven save us!) in Comic Sans!
info.additionalInfo:
v1.3 - Manteinance update.
v1.2 - Manteinance update.
v1.1 - Manteinance update.
v1.0 - Initial release.
